name: Ranjith S - Portfolio
description: Data Scientist & Machine Learning Engineer - Portfolio Website

security.csp: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https://avatars.githubusercontent.com https://*.githubusercontent.com; font-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'; upgrade-insecure-requests;

headers.Permissions-Policy: geolocation=(), microphone=(), camera=(), payment=(), usb=(), magnetometer=(), gyroscope=(), speaker=()
